content: hibernus mittens were designed to give a nod to christmas but not so much that you couldn t wear these mittens any time of year i love to put red and green together in a subtle way all yarns are knit pick palette 100% wool fingering weight celadon heather mc 80 yds rainforest heather 25 yds finnley heather 51 yds asphalt heather 46 yds lingonberry heather 15 yds this is a charted pattern first you make a 2x2 ribbed cuff topped with a latvian braid then the mittens are constructed in the round using three charts the main pattern/back of the hand the palm and the thumb/gusset the palm and thumb are done in a checkerboard pattern that you can knit without following the chart once you get the pattern established
